analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Airdrop.takeSnapshot (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol#239-263):
	External calls:
	- beneficiary.balance = token.balanceOf(addresses[i]) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol#244-245)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- beneficiaries (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol#249-251)

Airdrop.destroy (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol#354-359) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol#357-358)

Airdrop.airdropAndBurn (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol#265-288) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(hell,burn) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol#287-288)

Airdrop.flushTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol#346-351) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol#350-351)

Airdrop.takeSnapshot has external calls inside a loop:
	- beneficiary.balance = token.balanceOf(addresses[i]) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol#244-245)

Airdrop.airdropAndBurn has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(token.transfer(addresses[i],beneficiary.airdrop)) (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol#273-274)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/31/0x0b72b3fb545fe6cb63e27273078d7a8656a34c42.sol#1): it allows old versions
